'''''Mallorn'' 52''' is the fifty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s biannual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in Autumn [[2011]].

* '''Cover Art'''
** ''A Conversation with Smaug''
*** By: [[Ted Nasmith]]

*** By: [[Nancy Martsch]]

*** By: Zak Cramer

** "A doom of diamonds": ''The King of Diamonds'' by [[Simon Tolkien]]
*** Reviewed by Mike Foster
** "The Welsh connection": ''[[Tolkien and Wales|Tolkien and Wales: Language, Literature and Identity]]'' by Carl Phelpstead
*** Reviewed by Troels Forchhammer
** "From Middle Ages to [[Middle-earth]]": ''[[The Keys of Middle-earth|The Keys of Middle-Earth: Discovering Medieval Literature through the Fiction of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' by Stuart D. Lee and Elizabeth Solopova
*** Reviewed by Kastytis Zubovas
** "The green revolution": ''[[Ents, Elves, and Eriador|Ents, Elves, And Eriador: The Environmental Vision of J. R. R. Tolkien]]'' by [[Matthew Dickerson]] and [[Jonathan Evans]]
*** Reviewed by Kusumita P. Pedersen
** "The lion, the witch and the baffled producers": ''[[wikipedia:The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader|The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader]]
